sermons.title: Honouring Our Heavenly Father
sermons.preacher_description:
Brian Long ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Brian Long in mp3 format. Brother Brian Long is the pastor of Cornerstone Community Church of Barnsdall. God has done a powerful work in this brothers life as he has served as a baptist pastor for a season and now God has called him out to a independent work under the Headship of Jesus Christ.
He has spoken at SermonIndex Conference as well as other revival meetings in Churches across America. His burden and passion for the glory of Jesus Christ alone is evident in his preaching. The emphasis on prayer and the prayer meeting in their fellowship has been the power behind the local church, you are welcome to visit locally for their prayer time on Wednesday.
